mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_board(ADMIN_BOARD_SEQ, ADMIN_BOARD_ID, ADMIN_BOARD_TITLE, ADMIN_BOARD_CONTENT, ADMIN_BOARD_DATE, ADMIN_BOARD_CNT, ADMIN_BOARD_FILE, ADMIN_BOARD_STATIC) VALUES(nextval('BOARD_SEQ'), #{adminBoardId}, #{adminBoardTitle}, #{amdinBoardContent}, now(), 0, #{adminBoardFilePath, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.ArrayTypeHandler}, false)
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS rownum, * FROM admin_board order by rownum desc LIMIT 3
